channel.title: Data Science on Simplissimo
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Simplissimo

item.title: Multiple comparison
item.description:
Let say you have a data set with many columns and you would like to see if there are is any statistically significant dependence between some of the parameters. Just write a script and find those with p < 0.05 - right?

Actually no… You are almost guarantied to have at least 5% of those columns to be statistically significantly correlated. This is known as a “multiple comparison” problem.

item.title: Data Science in Science
item.description: Here I gather some examples of use of Data Scince in a traditional sciences: Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and others

item.title: Essentials of Data Science
item.description: There is a lot of information on Data Science on Internet. On this page I summarize the most essential things you would need to know to start working on real projects. The rest you can figure out on the way. This page is intentionally short (relativelly). Books R for Data Science An Introduction to Statistical Learning Data Science for Business Tools, Installation and updating installr package
